===Etymology===
[[雞]] ([[chickens]]) + [[犬]] ([[dogs]]) + [[不]] ([[not]]) + [[驚]] ([[startled]])

===Idiom===

# a [[well]]-[[disciplined]] [[army]] (i.e. an army that is so disciplined, it doesn't startle the chickens and dogs of the enemy)
